properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 4 at 7:54PM CST until January 7 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Warning
for the following rivers in Mississippi...

Yazoo River At Yazoo City affecting Yazoo County

The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Yazoo River At Yazoo City
* from late tonight to Tuesday afternoon.
* At  7:00 PM Saturday the stage was 28.9 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 29.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage just after
midnight tonight and will continue to rise to near 29.5 feet early
Monday morning.
* Flood history...This crest compares to a previous crest of 30.0 feet
on Mar 25 2015.
* Impact...At 29.0 feet...Minor over bank is flooding is occurring
along the river.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive or walk through areas where water covers roadway! The
water may be deeper than it appears. Remember...Turn around, don't
drown!

Please note that forecast crests are based upon rainfall that has
occurred along with forecast rainfall for the next 24 hours.

Additional information is available at:
https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN

The next regularly scheduled update is expected between 8 and 10 AM.
